name: Bot Patrol (itch)
description:
Bot Patrol is a game about a self driving car, the car has malfunctioned and now it is up to you to clear the way and protect the car. 

How To Play

Just left click and hold to grab the incoming cars then fling them with your mouse to throw them away!
